education.degree: Honor Bachelor of Science double majored in Computer Science and Statistics

work.title: Software Develper
work.description: 1. Working with two co-founders, designing and developing a web application for an online board to post research studies for researchers to find participants. 2. Designed and implemented the search functionality across studies, enabling full-text search by keyword and address proximity. 3. Designed and implemented the database layer with MongoDB. 4. Defined UX requirements and implemented the front-end using ReactJS. 5. Proposed, designed and implemented an interactive address autocomplete form using the Google Maps API.
